moving

Class TestEnemy

  • java.lang.Object
    • moving.Enemy
      • moving.TestEnemy

  • public class TestEnemy
extends Enemy
    An Enemy made just for testing purposes. Gives an incredible amount of experience points, but takes a while to kill.

    • Field Summary

      • Fields inherited from class moving.Enemy

    • Constructor Detail

      • TestEnemy

        public TestEnemy(java.lang.String name,
         int x,
         int y,
         java.util.HashMap<Item,java.lang.Double> drops,
         java.awt.Image img)
        Default constructor.
        Parameters:
        name - Enemy's name.
        x - The x-position of the enemy on the map.
        y - The y-position of the enemy on the map.
        drops - A HashMap that represents the drops of the enemy (Item, and the chance of it dropping from the enemy once the enemy dies.)
        img - The Image of the Enemy.
